Namespace AV.Cloud

Contains functions for calling and declaring cloud functions.

Some functions are only available from Cloud Code.


Defined in: av.js.

Namespace Summary

Namespace Detail
AV.Cloud
Method Detail
<static> AV.Cloud.afterDelete(arg1, func)
Registers an after delete function.
Available in Cloud Code only. If you want to use afterDelete for a predefined class in the AV JavaScript SDK (e.g. AV.User), you should pass the class itself and not the String for arg1. 
 AV.Cloud.afterDelete('MyCustomClass', function(request) {
    // code here
  })

  AV.Cloud.afterDelete(AV.User, function(request) {
    // code here
  })

Defined in: cloud.js.
Parameters:
{Class} arg1
The AV.Object subclass to register the before save function for. This can instead be a String that is the className of the subclass.
{Function} func
The function to run before a save. This function should take just one parameter, AV.Cloud.AfterDeleteRequest.
<static> AV.Cloud.afterSave(name, func)
Registers an after save function.
Available in Cloud Code only. 
 AV.Cloud.afterSave('MyCustomClass', function(request) {
     // code here
    })

 AV.Cloud.afterSave(AV.User, function(request) {
   // code here
 })

Defined in: cloud.js.
Parameters:
{Class} name
The AV.Object subclass to register the after save function for. This can instead be a String that is the className of the subclass.
{Function} func
The function to run after a save. This function should take just one parameter AV.Cloud.AfterSaveRequest.
<static> AV.Cloud.afterUpdate(name, func)
Registers an after update function.
Available in Cloud Code only. 
 AV.Cloud.afterUpdate('MyCustomClass', function(request) {
     // code here
    })

 AV.Cloud.afterUpdate(AV.User, function(request) {
   // code here
 })

Defined in: cloud.js.
Parameters:
{Class} name
The AV.Object subclass to register the after update function for. This can instead be a String that is the className of the subclass.
{Function} func
The function to run after a update. This function should take just one parameter AV.Cloud.AfterUpdateRequest.
<static> AV.Cloud.beforeDelete(arg1, func)
Registers a before delete function.
Available in Cloud Code only. If you want use beforeDelete for a predefined class in the AV JavaScript SDK (e.g. AV.User), you should pass the class itself and not the String for arg1. 
 AV.Cloud.beforeDelete('MyCustomClass', function(request, response) {
    // code here
  })

  AV.Cloud.beforeDelete(AV.User, function(request, response) {
    // code here
  })

Defined in: cloud.js.
Parameters:
{Class} arg1
The AV.Object subclass to register the before delete function for. This can instead be a String that is the className of the subclass.
{Function} func
The function to run before a delete. This function should take two parameters a AV.Cloud.BeforeDeleteRequest and a AV.Cloud.BeforeDeleteResponse
<static> AV.Cloud.beforeSave(name, func)
Registers a before save function.
Available in Cloud Code only. 
   AV.Cloud.beforeSave('MyCustomClass', function(request, response) {
   // code here
 })

 AV.Cloud.beforeSave(AV.User, function(request, response) {
   // code here
 })

Defined in: cloud.js.
Parameters:
{Class} name
The AV.Object subclass to register the before save function for. This can instead be a String that is the className of the subclass.
{Function} func
The function to run before a save. This function should take two parameters a AV.Cloud.BeforeSaveRequest and a AV.Cloud.BeforeSaveResponse.
<static> AV.Cloud.cronJob(name, cron, func)
Define a timer that will execute by the crontab-like expression.
Available in Cloud Code only. 
 
      //Log at 1:00 AM everyday.
      AV.Cloud.cronJob("timer1", "0 1 * * * ?", function(){
          consooe.log("timer1 log");
      });

Defined in: cloud.js.
Parameters:
name
The timer's unique identifier.
cron
The crontab-like string in the form of 'sec min hour dayOfMonth month dayOfWeek [year]'.
func
The function to be executed.
<static> {AV.Promise} AV.Cloud.httpRequest(The)
Makes an HTTP Request.
Available in Cloud Code only.
Defined in: cloud.js.
Parameters:
{Object} The
options objects that makes the request.
Returns:
{AV.Promise} A promise that will be resolved with a AV.Cloud.HTTPResponse object when the request completes.
<static> AV.Cloud.onLogin(func)
Registers an on-login function.
Available in Cloud Code only. If you want to use onLogin for an user in the AV JavaScript SDK, you should pass the function: 
  AV.Cloud.onLogin(function(request, response) {
    // code here
  });

Defined in: cloud.js.
Parameters:
{Function} func
The function to run before an user signin. This function should take two parameters a AV.Cloud.FunctionRequest and a AV.Cloud.FunctionResponse.
<static> {AV.Promise} AV.Cloud.requestSmsCode(data, options)
Makes a call to request a sms code for operation verification.
Parameters:
{Object} data
The mobile phone number string or a JSON object that contains mobilePhoneNumber,template,op,ttl,name etc.
{Object} options
A Backbone-style options object
Returns:
{AV.Promise} A promise that will be resolved with the result of the function.
<static> {AV.Promise} AV.Cloud.run(name, data, options)
Makes a call to a cloud function.
Parameters:
{String} name
The function name.
{Object} data
The parameters to send to the cloud function.
{Object} options
A Backbone-style options object options.success, if set, should be a function to handle a successful call to a cloud function. options.error should be a function that handles an error running the cloud function. Both functions are optional. Both functions take a single argument.
Returns:
{AV.Promise} A promise that will be resolved with the result of the function.
<static> AV.Cloud.setInterval(name, interval, func)
Define a timer will wait a specified number of seconds, and then execute a specified function, and it will continue to execute the function, once at every given time-interval.
Available in Cloud Code only. For example: 
 
      //Log every second.
      AV.Cloud.setInterval("timer1", 1, function(){
          consooe.log("timer1 log");
      });

Defined in: cloud.js.
Parameters:
name
The timer's unique identifier.
interval
The length of the time-intervals between each execution in seconds.
func
The function to be executed.
<static> AV.Cloud.useMasterKey()
Switches the AVOSCloud SDK to using the Master key. The Master key grants priveleged access to the data in AVOSCloud and can be used to bypass ACLs and other restrictions that are applied to the client SDKs.

Available in Cloud Code and Node.js only.

<static> {AV.Promise} AV.Cloud.verifySmsCode(code, phone, options)
Makes a call to verify sms code that sent by AV.Cloud.requestSmsCode
Parameters:
{String} code
The sms code sent by AV.Cloud.requestSmsCode
{phone} phone
The mobile phoner number(optional).
{Object} options
A Backbone-style options object
Returns:
{AV.Promise} A promise that will be resolved with the result of the function.
